title: Bank statements for loan applications
personalDataVerified: Account holder name, account number (masked), transaction history, account balances, bank name, statement period
personalDataVisible: Link to financial institution system (lenders and verification services, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake bank statements easily forged via Photoshop. Domain binding verifies financial institution. Tamper-evident asset verification for loan approval. Prevents asset fraud where borrowers inflate account balances. Reserves and liquidity verification. Multi-page statements benefit from per-page hash verification to prevent page substitution attacks (swapping pages from different months or accounts). Critical for lending where asset verification prevents fraud.
